description: UCLan Cyprus is located in Larnaca, and it is now in its twelfth year of operation. It is the first Branch Campus of the University of Central Lancashire and at the same time a fully licensed University in Cyprus. The completion of studies at UCLan Cyprus will result in a double-awarded degree (two certificates) from the two Universities, UCLan UK and UCLan Cyprus, recognized not only in Cyprus and UK, but also across Europe and beyond. The University consists of four schools: School of Management, School of Sciences, School of Arts, Media & Communication, and School of Law.
